item.title: Known issues - Mach engine
item.description: Known issues If you’re trying to run the Mach examples or similar, you may be running into one of these known issues. nixOS If you are using nixOS, we have tips on how to use Mach with it here. Windows File not found If you encounter an error like this: Windows does not have symlinks enabled, or Git is not configured to use them. This is very annoying and has been reported to Microsoft.
